import React from "react"; import "./product.css"; import { useMoralis, useNewMoralisObject } from "react-moralis"; class Product extends React.Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { artNum: null, prodName: null, categorie: null, credits: null, amount: null, }; this.handleChange = this.handleInputChange.bind(this); } handleInputChange(event) { const target = event.target; var value = target.value; const name = target.name; if (target.type === "checkbox") { if (target.checked) { this.state.hobbies[value] = value; } else { this.state.hobbies.splice(value, 1); } } else { this.setState({ [name]: value, }); } } submit() { console.warn(this.state); } render() { return (
